content:
34    攻擊時，有10%的機率增加20%的物理暴擊率和10%的魔法暴擊率，效果持續20秒。


[if]

[cooltime]
40000    
[attack success]
1    

[/if]

[then]

[target]
`myself`
-1    
[duration]
20000    
[probability]
10    
[reduce probability to human armor at pvp module]
80    
[stat]
`physical critical hit rate`
`+`
20    
[stat]
`magical critical hit rate`
`+`
10    
[/then]
